firstPage.title: The purpose
firstPage.text: Reading Check by Lexplore is a quick and practical way to evaluate your child's reading ability and get a sense of how they will function academically at a specific grade level. It is based on the well established method Running Records. The immediate results and instructional resources offered will guide you toward the appropriate next steps in your child's successful reading development.

secondPage.title: The Simple Setup
secondPage.text: The examiner and the reader can sit together, each with their own device (phone, tablet or computer). The reader's text can be printed if you do not have two devices available.

thirdPage.title: To Begin
thirdPage.text: Select the user mode on each device.

childReadingFirstPage.title: Passage 1 / 2
childReadingFirstPage.text: Beth and Jake want to sell lemonade in the neighborhood. Beth squeezes big lemons. Jake adds sugar and water. Beth stirs the yellow liquid. Jake adds ice to the pitcher. Bethâ€™s mom sets up a table. Beth and Jake sell cups of lemonade for fifty cents.

childReadingSecondPage.title: Passage 2 / 2
childReadingSecondPage.text: The Atlantic Spotted Dolphins are found in the Atlantic Ocean. They live in warm shallow water. Their spotted bodies are dark gray and their bellies are white. Atlantic Spotted Dolphins eat small fish. These dolphins are fast swimmers and will often swim near boats.
